private_settings.name: synchronized_segments_hero
private_settings.headerTemplate:
The above list of segments is a whitelist. You need to *explicitely specify one or more segments* for which users and events shall be sent to Close.io.
If you do not specify any segment, no user or event will be sent to Close.io.
private_settings.title: Whitelisted Segments

private_settings.name: send_events_hero
private_settings.headerTemplate:
The above list of events is a whitelist. You need to *explicitely specify one or more events* that shall be sent to Close.io.
If you do not specify any event, no event data will be sent to Close.io.
private_settings.title: Whitelisted Events
